item.title: Item recolour problem
item.dc:creator: @Volrom Volrom
item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

Soul, I’d suggest taking some orientation classes, because you have to add code and edit it yourself, but this is the only time i’ll do this (JK). Try to build around this using your coding above:

 if(i == 9097)
        {
            class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
            class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
            class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
            class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
            class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
            class8.anIntArray160[0] = 999999;
            class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912;
            class8.anIntArray160[1] = 999999;
            class8.anInt181 = 1740;
            class8.anInt190 = 444;
            class8.anInt198 = 0;
            class8.anInt204 = 0;
            class8.anInt169 = 0;
            class8.anInt194 = -8;
            class8.anInt165 = 5024;
            class8.anInt200 = 5025;
            class8.anInt174 = 5026;
            class8.anInt188 = -1;
            class8.anInt164 = -1;
            class8.anInt175 = -1;
            class8.anInt197 = -1;
            class8.aString170 = "My Recoloured Platelegs";
            class8.aByteArray178 = "My Recoloured Platelegs".getBytes();
        }

item.title: Item recolour problem
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

how can i change colour of this item? and dont just post ‘‘get a guide’’ or ‘‘use the search button’’

if(i == 9145) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 4681; //Model ID
class8.anInt181 = 900;//Model Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 540;//Model Rotation
class8.anInt198 = 2039;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt199 = 0;//noteable
class8.anInt169 = 0;// model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 4682;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 4683;//female wearing
class8.anInt164 = 4685;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = 4684;//male arms/sleeves
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Soulero’s Plate”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “Soulero’s Powerful plate”.getBytes();//examin info
}

this whas the codes that i added to class8 (fully working) but how can i change the colour of it?

Read full topic
